analysis.description: ElyxrShrimpFarmer._isContract (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#205-215) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol:
	Contract ElyxrShrimpFarmer has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#72-74)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in ElyxrShrimpFarmer.sellEggs (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#119-131):
	External calls:
	- eggValue = calculateEggSell(hasEggs) (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#122-123)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claimedEggs (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#124-125)
	- lastHatch (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#125)
	- marketEggs (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#126)

ElyxrShrimpFarmer.tokenFallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#80-100) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transfer(ceoAddress,devFee(_value)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#93-95)

ElyxrShrimpFarmer.sellEggs (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#119-131) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transfer(ceoAddress,fee) (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#129)
	-tokenContract.transfer(msg.sender,SafeMath.sub(eggValue,fee)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x3bc06304959cb2cfec0c8073eb6f31b466ce3f17.sol#129-131)
